akn:content.akn:p:
§ 281f. Authorization of appropriations There are hereby authorized to be appropriated the sums of not more than $2,130,000 for the acquisition of lands and interests in land and not more than $9,300,000 for construction, restoration work, and other improvements at the Nez Perce National Historical Park under this subchapter. (Pub. L. 89–19, § 7, May 15, 1965, 79 Stat. 111; Pub. L. 94–578, title II, § 201(10), Oct. 21, 1976, 90 Stat. 2733; Pub. L. 102–576, § 2(7), Oct. 30, 1992, 106 Stat. 4771.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1992—Pub. L. 102–576 substituted “$2,130,000” for “$630,000” and “$9,300,000” for “$4,100,000”. 1976—Pub. L. 94–578 substituted “$4,100,000” for “$1,337,000”.
